name: TumbVR
description: A museum in VR with aFrame and Tumblr

scripts.build: browserify client/js/app/main.js -o public/tumbvr_dev.js -v && browserify client/js/app/main.js | uglifyjs -cm > public/tumbvr_prod.js
scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=dev&& concurrently "nodemon server.js" "watchify client/js/app/main.js -o public/js/tumbvr_dev.js -v"
